review: We had a great time in the Illusionist room- really intriguing clues- great for all kids 10 and up and groups of folks!

room_title: Escape room "Order of Illusionists" by Lockbox Escape Room in Miami
review: We went to The Illusionist room. This was a very exciting room. There were a lot of different puzzles to solve. There were also many surprises! My teenagers also thought this was a great escape room!
